Method Detail

combatStartFight

public boolean combatStartFight(Enemy enemy,
                                MovableObject weapon,
                                Player player)
CombatFight Method Used when the player types in: fight ENEMY-NAME with WEAPON method will loop until either the player or the enemy runs out of health points Both the player and enemy have weapons in there inventory and use them every time they attack. Method return whether the player has won, true or false. It also prints messages to the player with health stats

Parameters:
enemy - The enemy object you are fighting
weapon - The weapon you have selected from your inventory
player - The player object of player1
Returns:
true if player win the fight
